{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Heart of the Sacred Mountain|It|Heart of the Sacred Mountain}} is a space located deep beneath the [[Great Volcano of Tollan]]. It contains the heart of the primal flame, [[Phlogiston]], as well as the final legacy of the ancient [[dragon]]s, the Natlan Phlogistonization Array ('''Huitzilopochtli''').<ref name="Final Entreaty">{{Ref/Quest|An Omen of Annihilation and the Final Entreaty}}</ref></p>}}

The player gains access to it after completing the {{Quest|In Search of a Hidden Heart}}.
